item.title: FAQ
item.description: FAQ # Supergraph vs alternative approaches # Connect domains Consume APIs Discover demand Technology Connector CI/CD Performance API Composability API portal Analytics Ecosystem integrations API gateway High N/A (no API aggregation features) Low Medium Medium Low IPaaS Low Low Medium Medium Medium Low Data virtualization Low Low - medium (usually designed for analytical workloads) High (usually only for non-API sources) Low (not API driven, usually SQL) N/A (no API analytics) Medium Supergraph Medium to High - depends on stack Medium to High - depends on stack Medium to High - depends on stack High High Depends on stack
